FILE: cm101220v11.0.txt
DYAD: VENEZUELA - FRANCE
RIVALRY: RIV283
DISPUTE(S): MID1628 
RIVALRY: RIV284
DISPUTE(S): MID310 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170803
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170803


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

Pre-1900 MIDs: MID1628

MID310 

TERRMID: MID310 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID310 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID310 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID310 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID310 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID310 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID310 from MID-B data, this MID has date range 10/1905-12/1905. From NYT 10/19/1905, France deployed several warships to the coast of Venezuela, seemingly to coerce repayment on defaulted loans. UK had repeatedly deployed warships to Venezuela and other Latin American countries around this time to force repayment of loans. Coded not maritime because the boundary was not disputed. 

ISLMID: MID310 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID310 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID310 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID310 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID310 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID310 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID310 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID310 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID310 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID310 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES: 


NARRATIVE-CM:


SOURCES-CM:


NARRATIVE-CR:


SOURCES-CR:

NYT 10/19/1905.
